description: Satoru is http://anidb.net/ch11023 [Makoto]`s younger brother and works as a businessman. Aside from that, he is also a gifted shogi player himself, who dreams to one day defeat his brother in an official match. His girlfriend was working with http://anidb.net/ch3338 [Shion]`s dead parents, and mysteriously died one day after them.
name: Hani Satoru
